resources.name: obter cliente
resources.description:
# OBTER CLIENTES
`base url = https://api.pagar.me/core/v5`

com GET e endpoint ` /costumers e /cus_4rl6WrJUnU3WoMDq` para o id do usuario que quer obter a  
	 sintaxe do ID do usuario é `cus_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX`insira os parâmetros caso haja, page,
	 code,
	 size, aperte Send 
	 caso haja sucesso : `
	 
	 
	 
	 {
	"id": "cus_4rl6WrJUnU3WoMDq",
	"name": "bolsonaro",
	"delinquent": false,
	"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:51:48Z",
	"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:51:48Z",
	"phones": {} }

resources.name: Create user
resources.description:
# Como criar um usuário
 `base url =  https://api.pagar.me/core/v5`
 
no endpoint `/costumers` insira os dados requeridos no body:

```javascript
{
  "birthdate": "11/11/2000",
  "name": "HomemDosPost",
  "email": "homempostando@gmail.com",
  "code": "MY_CUSTOMER_09",
  "document_type": "CPF",
  "gender": "male"
}
```
e com POST, crie um usuario

resources.name: List users pagination
resources.description:
# Como listar usuários
 `base url =  https://api.pagar.me/core/v5`
 
com GET e endpoint `/costumers`, insira os parâmetros caso haja, `page, code, size`, aperte Send

caso haja sucesso (exemplo)
```javascript
{
	"data": [
		{
			"id": "cus_rYDqEl8sJspEyVKd",
			"name": "HomemDosPost",
			"email": "homempostando@gmail.com",
			"code": "MY_CUSTOMER_09",
			"document_type": "cpf",
			"type": "individual",
			"gender": "male",
			"delinquent": false,
			"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:21:22Z",
			"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
			"birthdate": "2000-11-11T00:00:00Z",
			"phones": {}
		}
	],
	"paging": {
		"total": 1
	}
}
```

`page`: define o número da página que aparece
`size`: define o número de entidades a mostrar por página
`code`: pegar uma entidade específica com este código

resources.name: Listar pedidos
resources.description:
# Como listar pedidos
 `base url =  https://api.pagar.me/core/v5`

com GET e endpoint `/orders`, insira os parâmetros caso haja, `order_id`, aperte Send

caso haja sucesso (exemplo)
```javascript
{
			"id": "or_rdBWGEmSESxGQk5g",
			"code": "7NDVI0IGNW",
			"amount": 10000,
			"currency": "BRL",
			"closed": true,
			"items": [
				{
					"id": "oi_veM8xO3SpSNxgawb",
					"type": "product",
					"description": "chaveiro",
					"amount": 1000,
					"quantity": 10,
					"status": "active",
					"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
					"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
					"code": "chaveirogamer"
				}
			],
			"customer": {
				"id": "cus_rYDqEl8sJspEyVKd",
				"name": "HomemDosPost",
				"email": "homempostando@gmail.com",
				"code": "MY_CUSTOMER_09",
				"document_type": "cpf",
				"gender": "male",
				"delinquent": false,
				"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:21:22Z",
				"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
				"birthdate": "2000-11-11T00:00:00Z",
				"phones": {}
			},
			"status": "pending",
			"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
			"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
			"closed_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
			"charges": [
				{
					"id": "ch_gNzpAoLhkh2Bb13x",
					"code": "7NDVI0IGNW",
					"amount": 10000,
					"status": "pending",
					"currency": "BRL",
					"payment_method": "cash",
					"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
					"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
					"customer": {
						"id": "cus_rYDqEl8sJspEyVKd",
						"name": "HomemDosPost",
						"email": "homempostando@gmail.com",
						"code": "MY_CUSTOMER_09",
						"document_type": "cpf",
						"gender": "male",
						"delinquent": false,
						"created_at": "2024-03-14T10:21:22Z",
						"updated_at": "2024-03-14T10:28:08Z",
						"birthdate": "2000-11-11T00:00:00Z",
						"phones": {}
					}
				}
			]
		},
```

`order_id`: define qual pedido vai aparecer baseado no seu id


`page`: define o número da página que aparece


`size`: define o número de entidades a mostrar por página

resources.name: Criar Pedido Cash
